text: Mega, whose letters stand for Red Televisiva Megavisión, is a Chilean television network. == Programs == Program Actors/TV presenters Meganoticias Matinal (2019-present) Meganoticias Actualiza (2019-present) Meganoticias Prime (2019-present) Mucho gusto (2001-present) === Previous programs === Program Actors/TV presenters Eres mi tesoro (TV shows, 2015-present) María José Bello and Álvaro
